catalog_info.title: Italian Best-Sellers: Marco Polo to Calvino
catalog_info.description: An introduction to Italian studies through a selection of works from the different fields of travel writing, political philosophy, melodrama, children fiction, comics, painting, design, literature and film. The course will showcase best-sellers that have provoked and sustained the interest of national and international audiences for centuries. Selections will include Marco Polo’s Il Milione, Machiavelli’s Il Principe, Verdi’s La Traviata, Collodi’s Pinocchio, and Calvino’s Citta invisibili. Reading in Italian and English. Discussion in Italian.
